SEARCH
Package view

Class HMSAppView

Object
HMSAppView
All Implemented Interfaces:
View
public class HMSAppView extends Object implements View
Represents the main view for the Hospital Management System (HMS) application. This class implements View interface. Provides methods for logging in, registering new users, and handling user-specific views based on roles.
Since:
2024-10-27
Version:
14.7
Author:
Eldon Lim Kai Jie

  • Constructor Details

    • HMSAppView

      public HMSAppView()
      Constructs the HMSAppView instance and initializes all role-specific views. Displays the application title and main menu.

  • Method Details

    • loginView

      public static void loginView()
      Displays the login view, prompting the user for credentials. Validates the credentials and directs the user to a password reset if it's their first login.

    • resetPassword

      private static void resetPassword()
      Prompts the user to reset their password upon first-time login. After changing password, prompts user to login again with new password.

    • handleLogin

      public static void handleLogin()
      Directs the user to their respective role-specific view based on their role.

    • registerView

      public static void registerView()
      Displays the registration view, prompting the user for their personal information. Registers a new patient in the system.

    • viewTitle

      public void viewTitle()
      Prints the title for the HMS application.
      Specified by:
      viewTitle in interface View

    • handleView

      public void handleView()
      Handles the main view menu, allowing the user to choose between login, registration, and exit. Executes the chosen option and handles invalid input.
      Specified by:
      handleView in interface View

    • printViewMenu

      public void printViewMenu()
      Prints the main menu options for the HMS application.
      Specified by:
      printViewMenu in interface View
